channel.title: classification on My blog
channel.description: Recent content in classification on My blog

item.title: The Soccer Fever
item.description: This will be my first participation in a Machinehack Hackathon. For those who don’t know the terminology, the term “hackathon” is a compound word, a fusion of “hacking” and “marathon”. It aims at solving technical problems in an innovative and unconventional way in a deliberately limited period of time: in a few hours or days participants have to create usable software code, which translates into a grueling race to develop applications.

item.title: Credit Card Fraud Detection
item.description: As one of my first data science projects I decided to complete this traditional Kaggle competition, in which we will try to detect cases of fraud in credit card transactions. Sensitivity of the 4 models developed for this task Context Detecting fraud transactions is of great importance for any credit card company. Here we are tasked to detect potential frauds so that customers are not charged for items that they did not purchase.
